name: Dragonic Overlord the End
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if your soul has a "Dragonic Overlord", this unit's drive cannot decrease from card effects, and it gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard two cards from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.
flavor: Carved in the memories of people, this is the brave figure of the dragon that burns life.

name: Burning Horn Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, reveal up to one card with "Overlord" in its card name and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you did not reveal a card, [Counter-Charge 1].[AUTO](RC):When your vanguard with "Overlord" in its card name attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Alongside its overlord, the demonic dragon continues to support its glory.

name: Phantom Blaster Overlord
effect: [CONT](VC):If your soul has a "Phantom Blaster Dragon", this unit gets [Critical] +1.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][retire two of your rear-guards], choose a "Blaster Dark" from your soul or drop, call it to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, that called unit and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: When the many despairs of the people have gathered, the hell dragon reveals its true form.

name: Majesty Lord Blaster
effect: [CONT](VC):If your soul has a "Blaster Blade" and a "Blaster Dark", this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Critical] +1. (Active on opponent's turn too)[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, perform all of the following. (You can choose to perform only one)・[COST][Put a "Blaster Blade" from your (RC) into your soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. ・[COST][Put a "Blaster Dark" from your (RC) into your soul], and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.
flavor: Enveloped in light and shadow, the legendary knight manifests.

name: Blaster Blade
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire, draw a card.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: The sword of bravery that advanced without fear became the light that brought hope.

name: Skull Witch, Nemain
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard's clan is only 《Shadow Paladin》 , [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a card from your hand into your soul], and draw two cards.
flavor: The witch converted the cumulation of regrets into power for revenge.

name: Deepening Night, Tamayura
effect: [AUTO](VC): At the beginning of your ride phase, you get "All of your front row units get [Power] +5000." until end of turn.[AUTO](VC): When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and perform one of the following.・Choose a card from your soul, and call it to (RC). ・Choose a card with "Ririmi" in its card name from your soul and a card with "Rarami" in its card name from your soul, and call them to (RC).[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: The night when the blue moon shines... Let us begin the march of the hundred demons.

name: Approaching Fangs, Kheios
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]: [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Discard a card from your hand], look at the top three cards of your deck, choose one card from among them and put it into your hand, choose up to one unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest into your soul.[AUTO](VC): When this unit attacks a vanguard, if your soul has eight or more cards with different card names, choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If your soul has thirteen or more cards with different card names, choose all of your rear-guards instead.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Ahh... Just destroying it is not enough!

name: Fountain of Knowledge, Eva
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of Research cards in your Order Zone, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], search your deck or hand for up to one card with "Obscudeid" in its card name, and call it to (RC). If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: That's because I'm a genius.

name: One Who Walks the Path of Light, Thegrea
effect: [CONT]:The normal ride from hand of a unit with “Thegrea” in its different card name from this unit on this unit also becomes a Persona Ride.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 or less unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If “One Who Blooms in the Dark, Thegrea” is in your soul, choose up to two instead of one.[AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle that this unit attacked, if this unit was placed by riding from "One Who Blooms in the Dark, Thegrea" this turn, [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: With the light of hope, I will create an unwavering future.

name: One Who Blooms in the Dark, Thegrea
effect: [CONT]:The normal ride from hand of a unit with “Thegrea” in its different card name from this unit on this unit also becomes a Persona Ride.[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Retire two of your grade 2 or less rear-guards], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If “One Who Walks the Path of Light, Thegrea” is in your soul, retire all of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as the chosen unit.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that this unit attacked, if this unit was placed by riding from "One Who Walks the Path of Light, Thegrea" this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: The dark despair will perfect my revenge.

name: For One's Precious Thing, Rorowa
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call up to three Plant tokens to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)[AUTO](VC):When this unit is attacked, [COST][retire one or more of your token units], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each unit retired for this cost.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Oh great trees of nature, grant me power!

name: Dragritter Girl of Flame Blossoms, Radylina
effect: [ACT](RC):If you do not have a Momokke token, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call up to one Momokke token to (RC).[Glitter]-Rorowa (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Rorowa" in its card name)[AUTO](RC): When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your token units in the same column as this unit, and this unit gets the [Power] of that unit until end of that battle. (Includes increased values)
flavor: Let's go, Momokke!

name: Twin Direful Dolls, Ririmi
effect: [AUTO]: When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a rear-guard with "Rarami" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and your opponent puts that unit into their soul.[Glitter]-Tamayura (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Tamayura" in its card name)[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (GC), you may put this card into your soul.
flavor: Tonight, at this moment of prosperity, allow me to show you colorful dreams.

name: Twin Direful Dolls, Rarami
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a rear-guard with "Ririmi" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.[Glitter]-Tamayura (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Tamayura" in its card name)[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (GC), you may put this card into your soul.
flavor: Under the stained cotton roof, allow me to show you colorless dreams.

name: Cool-headed Executor, Mikani
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent’s rear-guards with the same grade as the card [Soul-Blast] for this cost, and retire it.[Glitter]-Kheios (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Kheios" in its card name)[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your vanguard attacks, if your soul has eight or more cards with different card names, [Stand] this unit. If you [Stand] this unit, put this unit into your soul at the end of turn.
flavor: As you wish.

name: Knight of Blackness, Obscudeid
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your Order Zone has a Set Order, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, and if it has three or more Set Orders, this unit gets [Power] +10000 instead of +5000.[Glitter]-Eva (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Eva" in its card name)[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, if your Order Zone has three or more Research cards, this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.[CONT](RC)/(GC):This unit gets "Intercept", and [Shield] +10000.
flavor: This strike will cut through your regrets.

name: Atrocious? Moth Girl, Maple
effect: [AUTO]Drop:When your grade 3 or greater vanguard is placed during the ride phase, if you do not have a unit with "Maple" in its card name, you may call this card to (RC). (If there are 2 copies of this card in drop, you can only call one)[Glitter]-Thegrea (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Thegrea" in its card name)[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that this unit attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast one or more cards], choose a card from your soul with the same grade as the sum of the grades of the cards [Soul-Blast] for this cost, put it into your hand, and put this unit into your soul.
flavor: I'll become the world's number one villain!

name: Perforate Burner Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from your hand during your battle phase, put this card into your soul, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Oh blazing soul... For eternity.

name: Stealth Fiend, Forktail
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you may look at the top seven cards of your deck. If you do, choose up to one normal unit with “Stealth” in its card name or [Glitter] from among them, put it into your soul, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Dancing together with strangers is quite fun!

name: Acute Dragon, Eoraphas
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks or boosts, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your other grade 1 or less rear-guards.
flavor: They gather together and sink their fangs in their target. Fiercely and savagely.

name: Stealth Fiend, Amaviera
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent’s attacking unit has attacked two or more times this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle. (Active if this battle is its second attack this turn or more)
flavor: Exterminating a series of misfortunes, and shining light on the path. The pale sacred light of healing.

name: Amazing Frost
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and put it into your soul. Then, if your soul has eight or more cards with different card names, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If your soul has ten or more cards with different card names, this unit gets [Power] +10000 instead.
flavor: Just stay frozen over there and watch.

name: Steam Maiden, Barni
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your soul has eight or more cards with different card names, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a grade 1 or less card from your soul, and call it to (RC). If your soul has ten or more cards with different card names, choose a grade 4 or less card instead of a grade 1 or less card.
flavor: It's not just heroes that get their names carved in history, you know?

name: Incorruptible Holy Light, Eufha
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent’s attacking unit has attacked two or more times this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle. (Active if this battle is its second attack this turn or more)
flavor: Her kind light envelopes even sins that cannot be forgiven.

name: Pantarhei Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, choose a card from your hand, discard it, and if your Order Zone has a set order, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: All things constantly change. "Wishes" are no exception.

name: Lady Healer of the Creaking World
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent’s attacking unit has attacked two or more times this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle. (Active if this battle is its second attack this turn or more)
flavor: The tears from the destroyed world...... With this, I'll save you.

name: Experiment Successful!
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)[AUTO]:When this card is put into the Order Zone, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it. If your Order Zone has three or more Research cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and bind it.
flavor: Yes! The experiment was a success!

name: Knight of Protective Spear, Arthen
effect: [CONT]Front Row (RC):All of your rear-guards with different card names from this unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects.[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you persona rode this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: A flashing strike with all my might shall pierce through your darkness.

name: Knight of Loyalty, Bedivere
effect: [AUTO]: When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Knight of Friendship, Kay", call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: The tale of his way of life dedicated to loyalty has been passed down to future generations.

name: Livesaving Angel, Digriel
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When your other unit in the same column as this unit [Stand] from a card's effect, you may return this unit to your hand.
flavor: Now then, who should I heal next?

name: Prohibited Sight Witch, Erunmes
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) by the ability of your vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name during your turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: Ah, the perfect spell to close the curtains.

name: Knight of Friendship, Kay
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted “Knight of Loyalty, Bedivere", this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: No matter what hardships fell upon us, our friendship was never lost.

name: Invigorate Sage
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent’s attacking unit has attacked two or more times this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle. (Active if this battle is its second attack this turn or more)
flavor: The breath of life within me burns brightly against adversity.

name: Prodpollen Rafilous
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call up to two Plant tokens to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: Now everyone, it's time to proudly and gloriously bloom!

name: Adhesive Thread Mutant, Actiasticky
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn][COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Retire two of your other rear-guards], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Entertain me, okay? If you do, I'll let you live for the time being♪

name: Zypsophila Fairy, Asher
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), if your opponent’s attacking unit has attacked two or more times this turn, this unit gets [Shield] +15000 until end of that battle. (Active if this battle is its second attack this turn or more)
flavor: A phantasmal garden where happiness blooms, that evildoers cannot reach.

name: Motive Stealth Rogue, Tsumugi
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a normal unit with “Stealth” in its card name or [Glitter] from your drop, and put it into your soul.
flavor: Crossing boundaries and creating connections.

name: Festival of Burning, Tamayura
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "In the Calm Sunlight, Tamayura", choose up to one card with "Ririmi" or "Rarami" in its card name from your drop, and put it into your hand.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: No matter who they are, those who threaten us shall not be forgiven.

name: Fleeting Shine That Lights Life
effect: Play this card with [COST][Soul-Blast 2] if you have a vanguard with "Tamayura" in its card name!Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your opponent's front row units get [Power] -10000." until end of turn.
flavor: There are lives that shine magnificently because they are fleeting.

name: Quagmire of Solace, Kheios
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Approaching Fangs, Kheios", [Soul-Charge 1]. If the [Soul-Charge] card was a trigger unit, draw a card, and if it was normal unit, choose up to one card from your soul, and call it to (RC).[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Mercy and compassion to all fools.

name: Clumsy Assistant
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has five or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: "Danger" creates a sense of true suspense.

name: Flaming Pony
effect: [ACT](Soul):[COST][Bind this card], and [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: Carrying the dreams of children, the pony dashes merrily across the night sky.

name: Smooth Research Progress, Eva
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "An Afternoon Nap Regardless of Place, Eva", search your deck for up to one Research card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Hmm, hmm... I see!

name: Aiding Monster, Tectien
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from your hand during your turn, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one Set Order from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Suddenly appearing and occasionally protecting the city.

name: Obliging Monster, Secondel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose up to one non-trigger unit from your drop, and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you put a grade 3 or greater card, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], and draw a card.
flavor: Diligently supporting those in the ring!

name: Harsh Training, Thegrea
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Thegrea" in its card name, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Thegrea" or "Maple" in its card name from among it, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: These are the results of training. Let's keep going!

name: Knight of Spright, Freeda
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your main phase, if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 or less unit card with "Blaster" in its card name from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If you called, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: The passing wind calls upon heroes.

name: Blaster Dark
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire one of your other rear-guards], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your rear-guard was retired this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Becoming the shadow that clears the way. That was a sign of his resolve.

name: Energy Refill Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn for each of your other units.
flavor: Stay healthy, everyone! Knowing that you're all healthy gives me power!

name: Little Sage, Marron
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 with "Blaster" in its card name, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 with "Blaster" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you did not reveal a card, choose a "Wingal Brave" from your soul, and you may call it to (RC).[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have three or more units, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: The wisdom of a sage has guided heroes to victory many times.

name: Bravery To Stand Against, Will to Pierce Through
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1] if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name!Search your deck for up to one grade 2 unit card with "Blaster" in its card name, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: A sword endowed with courage and resolution slashes the sorrowful fate.

name: The World 3000 Years Later, Rorowa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][retire one of your rear-guards], and call up to two Plant tokens to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: So this is Cray 3000 years later!

name: Battle Siren, Shuzet
effect: [AUTO]:(RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of that battle for each of your [Rest] units.
flavor: Allow me to deal the finishing blow!

name: Stepping Calyx, Salvia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, you may call a Plant token to (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
flavor: With all of your feelings♪ Let's grow a small bud~♪

name: Excavation Dragon, Bariodigneel
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that this unit attacked, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: The penetration power of this drill is immeasurable when mana flows through the engine.

name: Stealth Dragon, Hadanressou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your vanguard's ability, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Allow me to carve up that life of yours which opposes my lord.

name: Rumbling Shear Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Such a majestic appearance, surely those who are strong cannot ignore it.

name: In the Calm Sunlight, Tamayura
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "Nine-tailed Fox Spirit, Tamayura", look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Ririmi" or "Rarami" in its card name or a Fox Art card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: May days like these continue forever.

name: Ignite Blow Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your soul has a grade 3, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.
flavor: Respond to your savage soul and strike with all your might!

name: Nine-tailed Fox Spirit, Tamayura
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Won't you come with me?

name: Amazement Magician
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: Keep your eyes on the box, okay? Three, two, one......!

name: Indicate Arrow Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), reveal the top card of your deck, if there are no cards in your soul with the same card name as the revealed card, [Soul-Charge 1].
flavor: At the tip of the arrow, discover the form of the future that you desire.

name: Steam Reaper, Nannia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your soul has five or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: All you need to do is stop the momentum. Just like this!

name: In the Calm Streets, Kheios
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Quagmire of Solace, Kheios", reveal the top two cards of your deck, put all normal units from among them into your soul, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: It means that I am a little familiar with history.

name: One With Profound Mercy, Kheios
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Can you tell me your desires?

name: Heavyarmed Panzer
effect: [CONT](RC):If your Order Zone has a Set Order, this unit gets "Boost".
flavor: It will destroy all obstacles and greet you with its maximum firepower.

name: Suppression Robo, Sir Repel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your Order Zone has two or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle. (Also includes your opponent's cards)
flavor: The city of my loved ones, I won't let you cause any more destruction!

name: AiD 9-V
effect: [AUTO]:(RC):When this unit boosts, if your Order Zone has two or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. (Also includes your opponent's cards)
flavor: First aid, complete. Now, rise. Let us resume.

name: An Afternoon Nap Regardless of Place, Eva
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "One Who Craves Knowledge, Eva", search your deck for up to one Research card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Mmmm... Mmmm......

name: Successor of the Variable Star
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for each of your Set Orders in your Order Zone.
flavor: With a love for civilization, those mischievous wings brings news of calamity.

name: One Who Craves Knowledge, Eva
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Knowledge, oh knowledge! Bestow upon me all possible knowledge!

name: Kindlight Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit [Stand] by a card's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: By sensing the pulse of life, the light will become stronger.

name: Gigantech Beater
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The physical strength of a giant can literally shatter problematic issues.

name: Knight of Clearsightness, Arviragus
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 2], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.
flavor: The goddess of victory shines on those who are one step ahead.

name: Divine Sister, Saint-Honoré
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & reveal a normal unit from your hand, and put it on the bottom of your deck], and draw a card.
flavor: Do you need more punishment?

name: Knight of Fearlessness, Rediquess
effect: [CONT](RC):If you rode a grade 3 or greater unit this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Now, let us fill the world with light.

name: Ampoule Scatterer Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your damage zone has three or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: If I scatter this many, I'm sure one of them will work♪

name: Knight of Old Animosity, Camloss
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your rear-guard was retired by your vanguard's ability this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The arrow bends and sings of sorrow. This is an elegy for my brethren.

name: Orgulous Lion
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than by the effect of "Orgulous Lion", if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one card with the same card name as this card, call it to (RC) as [Rest], and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Realizing its duty, this lion offers its fangs to fate.

name: Beneath the Brilliant Light, Thegrea
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Harsh Training, Thegrea", reveal the top card of your deck, and if it is a grade 2 or less unit card, you may call it to (RC) as [Rest]. (Return it to its original spot if you do not call)[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: What a pleasant morning. Perfect for training.

name: Glintbreath Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your soul has two or more grade 2 cards with "Blaster" in their different card names, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.
flavor: This dragon determines the true shine of a hero's soul.

name: Wingal Brave
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: He knows the value of courage, and believes in it until the end.

name: Knight of Integrity, Thegrea
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Our power of purity will bring peace to the world.

name: Rancor Spear Trooper
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 for each order card in your bind zone.
flavor: Contained within are malicious thoughts. What it wields, is ruin.

name: Tear Knight, Fleche
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your token units.
flavor: Torrent of shining life, together with this arrow!

name: Wild-fire Brave Shooter
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a grade 3 or greater unit, if it is the fourth battle of that turn or more, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: The battle is nearing the end... which means it's my time to shine!

name: Awakening from Slumber, Rorowa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding on "Bioroid Youth, Rorowa", call up to one Plant token to your back row center (RC). (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)[Glitter](This card is a [Glitter] that seeks the Fire Regalis)
flavor: Even I don't know why I was buried......

name: Knight of Nostalgia, Marco
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your grade 1 or less units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll show you my hometown some day.

name: Bioroid Youth, Rorowa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: If that means I can protect everyone......!

name: Blaster Blade
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. If you did not retire, draw a card.[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Dragonic Overlord the End
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if your soul has a "Dragonic Overlord", this unit's drive cannot decrease from card effects, and it gets [Power] +5000.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle that this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard two cards from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Phantom Blaster Overlord
effect: [CONT](VC):If your soul has a "Phantom Blaster Dragon", this unit gets [Critical] +1.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][retire two of your rear-guards], choose a "Blaster Dark" from your soul or drop, call it to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, that called unit and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Majesty Lord Blaster
effect: [CONT](VC):If your soul has a "Blaster Blade" and a "Blaster Dark", this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Critical] +1.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, perform all of the following.・[COST][Put a "Blaster Blade" from your (RC) into your soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it. ・[COST][Put a "Blaster Dark" from your (RC) into your soul], and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn.

name: Motive Stealth Rogue, Tsumugi
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose a normal unit with “Stealth” in its card name or [Glitter] from your drop, and put it into your soul.

name: Festival of Burning, Tamayura
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "In the Calm Sunlight, Tamayura", choose up to one card with "Ririmi" or "Rarami" in its card name from your drop, and put it into your hand.[Glitter]

name: Fleeting Shine That Lights Life
effect: Play this card with [COST][Soul-Blast 2] if you have a vanguard with "Tamayura" in its card name!Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets "[CONT](VC):All of your opponent's front row units get [Power] -10000." until end of turn.

name: Excavation Dragon, Bariodigneel
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that this unit attacked, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Stealth Dragon, Hadanressou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by your vanguard's ability, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Rumbling Shear Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: In the Calm Sunlight, Tamayura
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "Nine-tailed Fox Spirit, Tamayura", look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Ririmi" or "Rarami" in its card name or a Fox Art card from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter]

name: Ignite Blow Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If your soul has a grade 3, this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.

name: Nine-tailed Fox Spirit, Tamayura
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Momokke
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Retire one or more of your other rear-guards], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each unit retired for this cost. [Glitter]-Rorowa [CONT](RC):If you have a unit with "Radylina" in its card name in the same column as this unit, this unit can attack from the back row

name: Quagmire of Solace, Kheios
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Approaching Fangs, Kheios", [Soul-Charge 1]. If the [Soul-Charge] card was a trigger unit, draw a card, and if it was normal unit, choose up to one card from your soul, and call it to (RC).[Glitter]

name: Clumsy Assistant
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your soul has five or more cards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Flaming Pony
effect: [ACT](Soul):[COST][Bind this card], and [Soul-Charge 2].

name: Amazement Magician
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, you may [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Indicate Arrow Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), reveal the top card of your deck, if there are no cards in your soul with the same card name as the revealed card, [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Steam Reaper, Nannia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your soul has five or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: In the Calm Streets, Kheios
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Quagmire of Solace, Kheios", reveal the top two cards of your deck, put all normal units from among them into your soul, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.[Glitter]

effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from your hand during your turn, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one Set Order from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Obliging Monster, Secondel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose up to one non-trigger unit from your drop, and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you put a grade 3 or greater card, [COST][Soul-Blast 3], and draw a card.

name: Heavyarmed Panzer
effect: [CONT](RC):If your Order Zone has a Set Order, this unit gets "Boost".

effect: [AUTO]:When this unit intercepts, if your Order Zone has two or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Quagmire of Solace, Kheios
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Approaching Fangs, Kheios", [Soul-Charge 1]. If the [Soul-Charge] card was a trigger unit, draw a card, and if it was normal unit, choose up to one card from your soul, and call it to (RC).[Glitter]

name: In the Calm Streets, Kheios
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Quagmire of Solace, Kheios", reveal the top two cards of your deck, put all normal units from among them into your soul, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.[Glitter]

name: One With Profound Mercy, Kheios
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Smooth Research Progress, Eva
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "An Afternoon Nap Regardless of Place, Eva", search your deck for up to one Research card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter]

name: An Afternoon Nap Regardless of Place, Eva
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from "One Who Craves Knowledge, Eva", search your deck for up to one Research card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter]

name: One Who Craves Knowledge, Eva
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Experiment Successful!
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is put into the Order Zone, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it. If your Order Zone has three or more Research cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and bind it.

name: Harsh Training, Thegrea
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Thegrea" in its card name, look at the top five cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Thegrea" or "Maple" in its card name from among it, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[Glitter]

name: Beneath the Brilliant Light, Thegrea
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Harsh Training, Thegrea", reveal the top card of your deck, and if it is a grade 2 or less card, you may call it to (RC) as [Rest].[Glitter]

name: Knight of Integrity, Thegrea
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Knight of Loyalty, Bedivere
effect: [AUTO]: When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Knight of Friendship, Kay", call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit, and shuffle your deck.

name: Knight of Friendship, Kay
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle this unit boosted “Knight of Loyalty, Bedivere", this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Little Sage, Marron
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 2 with "Blaster" in its card name, look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 with "Blaster" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you did not reveal a card, choose a "Wingal Brave" from your soul, and you may call it to (RC).[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have three or more units, this unit gets [Power] +2000.

name: Wingal Brave
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Bravery To Stand Against, Will to Pierce Through
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1] if you have a vanguard with "Blaster" in its card name!Search your deck for up to one grade 2 unit card with "Blaster" in its card name, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: The World 3000 Years Later, Rorowa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][retire one of your rear-guards], and call up to two Plant tokens to (RC).[Glitter]

name: Awakening from Slumber, Rorowa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding on "Bioroid Youth, Rorowa", call up to one Plant token to your back row center (RC). [Glitter]

name: Bioroid Youth, Rorowa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Momokke
effect: (This represents a Momokke token, and cannot be put in a deck)[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Retire one or more of your other rear-guards], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each unit retired for this cost. [Glitter]-Rorowa (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with “Rorowa” in its card name) [CONT](RC):If you have a unit with "Radylina" in its card name in the same column as this unit, this unit can attack from the back row

name: Plant
effect: (This represents a Plant token, and cannot be put in a deck)
